price: 60. Jo žmonių lyderiai sakė: „Iš tiesų, mes matome, kad tu esi aiškiai paklydęs.“
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmihi innā lanarāka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
